options.responseText: Close? We’re so close I can taste it—and it tastes like freedom!

Backup plan? Hell yeah. If the Purity Cops try to throw us in the Shame Chamber, we’ll deploy the hacked holotape that turns the Overseer’s safety briefing into a Vault-Tec-approved hentai compilation. They’ll be drooling in five minutes or less, guaranteed.

options.optionText: I ran out of the mags. Do you have more?
options.responseText: Running dry already? I admire the hustle. Here, take these—limited edition, pre-war prints.

responseTexts: Remember, when your hand gets lonely tonight, you know where to find me. Viva la fap-olution!
When the potato farming and purity lectures get too much, just know there’s a stash of contraband and some loyal right hands waiting for you. Fap well, my friend.
Later, dude. I’ll be in the usual place... right behind you, lurking in the shadows. No pressure, though.

auto_lines: Dude, the vault is one suggestive joke away from exploding! I just saw two Purity Cops slap each other with their own Bonk Batons out of sheer frustration. We’ve got them flailing like fish out of water!
